description: Try our easy to follow Creamy Sweet Potato, Chicken and Leek Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Creamy Sweet Potato, Chicken and Leek Pie
name: Creamy Sweet Potato, Chicken and Leek Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g can condensed cream of chicken soup

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with steamed green vegetables. Tip 1: For 2 cups of creamy mash; cook 1 potato and sweet potato until tender, then mash with a little butter or a splash of cream, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Tip 2: Try adding extra vegetables to the pie filling, such as peas, carrots or mushrooms.
